long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
👋Say goodbye to time-consuming manual searches! With just one click, our intelligent algorithm scans the entire webpage and extracts the most relevant keywords from your desired website.

🔍 What is the Keyword Extractor Extension?
The Keyword Extractor Extension is a handy tool designed to help you extract relevant keywords from a  website's sitemap. Whether you're an SEO specialist, content creator, or researcher, this extension will streamline your keyword analysis process.

🔍 How to Use the Keyword Extractor Extension?
Using the extension is quick and easy! Here's a step-by-step guide to help you make the most of its features:

1️⃣ Activate the Extension: Click on the Keyword Extractor icon in your browser's toolbar to activate the extension.
2️⃣ Open Your Website: Go to your website's sitemap by entering "/sitemap_index.xml" after the website URL.
3️⃣ Click the extension icon and Choose "Extract Keywords": Once you've visited the sitemap, click on the extension icon, a popup will appear.
4️⃣ Click Extracted Keywords Button: Finally, click  "Extract Keywords" button, the list of your keywords with a text file will be downloaded.
5️⃣ Enjoy :)

🔥 Awesome Features:
✅ Super fast analysis: Get keywords in just a few seconds.
✅ Boost your productivity: Save time and energy.
✅ Make research easier: Quickly see a short summary.
✅ Stay ahead of the game: Get valuable insights for an advantage.
✅ Easy to use: Works smoothly with your web browsing.


🔐 Your Privacy and Security:
Don't worry, protecting your privacy is our top concern. We don't gather any of your personal information, so feel confident and use it without any concerns.


📣 Are you excited to discover the most valuable keywords of any website? Just go to any website sitemap and click the 'Extract' button 🔥
